de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.em

Class DiagonalGaussianModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.em.DiagonalGaussianModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EMClusterModel<EMModel>

    public class DiagonalGaussianModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements EMClusterModel<EMModel>
    Simpler model for a single Gaussian cluster, without covariances.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
